iati-activity.title: UN Medical Clinics in Guinea
iati-activity.description: Funding for the UN clinics in Guinea to maintain the required medical capacity and level of preparedness until the end of 2015 to ensure UN system’s duty of care to its personnel (and families).

iati-activity.title: Prevent EVD during Elections
iati-activity.description: UNDP will equip polling places with sanitary control equipment on a national level in order to prevent any potential EVD spread during the electoral process in the most vulnerable regions of Guinea.
